name: My Chicken Farm
description:
This year Mr. Gates released his chicken plan: a three farmers raise hens, a rooster, a total of three months can give birth to 12 chicks a year 250. In Africa, a chicken can be sold for about $ 5, then raised four Chickens can get $ 1,250 a year income.

This is what we cultivate is a "super chicken," This chicken is strong resistance, laying rate. By default we will give you three hens and a rooster, and a small amount of money and feed when the feed is used up, you need to store Surface buy feed. When the chicken Z sounds emitted when the description has been hungry, you need to feed them, or they will starve to death. Rooster or hen chickens grow up to be, you can sell them on the market.

You need to complete the game 360 ​​days a year, the actual time is about half an hour. As for how to get the maximum benefit, it depends entirely on your business strategy and skill.

Unlock PRO VERSION:
* Initial funding 1000G, and 3000 feed
* Feeding cap 3000
* Custom time
* No ads
* Automatic sale of eggs
* Unlimited Lined editor
* Professional analysis tools
